nodes.text: The holy irreducible garbágina was an object in the religious cosmology of the Ugors. Some worshippers swore by it.

In the adventure Echoes of the Jedi, the Ugor SplrMuck swears by the "holy irrebducible garbágina." As the Ugor pronunciation of Basic often replaces hard syllables for softer ones and introduces extra phonemes, such as /b/, it is likely that irrebducible is simply his mispronunciation of the word irreducible.
